sources.title: Fear No More (1961) Mala Powers, Jacques Bergerac, Anna Lee Carroll
sources.description: Fear No More is a 1961 American psychiatric FILM NOlR (although it could be argued that it is a thriller), directed by Bernard Wiesen and starring Mala Powers, Jacques Bergerac and Anna Lee Carroll. It was based on a 1946 novel of the same name by Leslie Edgley. Â  You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia and there is also a good review from the movie blog D for Doom .

sources.title: Fear No More (1961) NOIR CITY THRILLER
sources.description:
Exclusive FRIDAY at PizzaFLIX Edition!
Starring: Mala Powers, Jacques Bergerac, Anna Lee Carroll
Directed by: Bernard Wiesen

When a young secretary hops aboard the night train from Los Angeles to San Francisco to deliver an envelope for her boss, it takes an unexpected detour to Noir City. The intense score, composed and conducted by Paul Glass, would make Bernard Hermann proud.

metadata.Plot: Traveling by train from Los Angeles to San Francisco, a woman--recently released from psychiatric care--is accused of the murder of a woman found dead in her compartment. Arrested and taken off the train, she escapes custody and flees to her apartment, where she finds another murder victim. She realizes she is being set up, and sets out to find out who and why.
metadata.Actors: Mala Powers, Jacques Bergerac, John Harding
